Once per day, you can spend 10 minutes reviewing security precautions you have taken for your ward and recover 1 Resolve Point; this doesnâ€™t count as resting to regain Stamina Points. In addition, once per day when you witness your ward being damaged by or failing a saving throw against an effect from a @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.LbTcOixt155snCxE.JournalEntryPage.k9Gve90er7bp808w#significant-enemies]{significant enemy}, you recover 1 Resolve Point as a reaction.
